sentences.en: In other words, metamorphosis in mole salamanders is an atavism.
sentences.cn: 换句话说，鼹钝口螈的变态是一种返祖现象。

sentences.en: Last month, Metamorphosis Insectorum Surinamensium was republished.
sentences.cn: 上个月，Metamorphosis Insectorum Surinamensium 这本书再次被发行。

sentences.en: By what invisible power has this surprising metamorphosis been performed?
sentences.cn: 是什么无形的力量完成了这一惊人的蜕变？
